title: Ingenua in Controversias Evangelicorum, i.e. Lutheranorum ac Reformatorum, inter se, Inqvisitio, Prælectionibus ac Disputationibus Publicis in Elenchum B. Spanhemii, instituta
creator: Strimesius, Samuel  Spanheim, Friedrich
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Strimesius, Samuel  Spanheim, Friedrich: Ingenua in Controversias Evangelicorum, i.e. Lutheranorum ac Reformatorum, inter se, Inqvisitio, Prælectionibus ac Disputationibus Publicis in Elenchum B. Spanhemii, instituta  inque Duas Partes divisa: Quarum Prior Dissensum Lutheranor. & Reform. Minus-Fundamentalem exponit; Posterior, Consensum eorundem Fundamentalem asserit ac vindicat ; Cum Præfatione Pacifico-Apologetica. Francofurti ad Viadrum  Berlin 1708
